channel.title: How do you resize the moparscape forums
channel.description:
how do you resize the moparscape forums mine seem to have grown alot small, it used to be bigger but now its like ultra small.
wording and the forums itself. if anyone can give me info on how to resize it back to normal I thankyou

item.title: How do you resize the moparscape forums
item.dc:creator: @wesely wesely

item.title: How do you resize the moparscape forums
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Hold control and scroll your mouse wheel if you have one or go to view + zoom and change it there.

Read full topic
